title: Bernard Brandt
text: Bernard Brandt (born 14 November 1960) is a Swiss <a href="Freestyle%20skiing">freestyle skier</a>. He competed in the <a href="Freestyle%20skiing%20at%20the%201992%20Winter%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20moguls">men's moguls event</a> at the <a href="1992%20Winter%20Olympics">1992 Winter Olympics</a>.
